lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guys, I want to give a quick thank you to Amazon for delaying all my orders, making me put my costume together last minute out of shit I found at Home Depot. So, thanks, Amazon. It's fantastic, I appreciate it. All right, anyway. I guess we should go through everyone else's to see the magnificent costumes around us. Let's go and start over here with our fantastic--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am Hotis! The rakshasa. And I cannot speak with my mouth hole. (growls)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have Clarota, but the mask is currently on its way here because I didn't have nearly enough coffee. So on the break there will be a giant squiddy mask that is terrible, just terrible. It's the worst thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Half Clarota! I am Doctor Anna Ripley, from Wildemount.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You suck, Ripley!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And uber Percy fangirl. That's me. Cheers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! Nice, nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Liam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hi, Hi. I am Tyriok. I make maps.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why are you having trouble picking that up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, well. I was turned to stone recently and I don't have two arms anymore. I have one. I can still roll dice though and I have maps and I have a compass and I am the least dangerous person at the tables. I'm not level one in anything, really, except maps. I'm level 15 in maps. I'm just happy to be here and be alive. Mostly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've been opening doors for him all night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Liam. That's awesome. Laura!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm Lady Briarwood. Here with the man I broke the world for.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You broke it for me, baby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right. You should say who you are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh right. I'm Lord Briarwood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Undead. Betrothed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right. More than betrothed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know, people who are in love high five?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We be representing the dead motherfuckers in this game.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you not?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, man.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Just inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, me and Travis are the only dead ones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess. Well, I am dead. No, I am dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Currently dead, but you weren't undead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly. I misunderstood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're both dead. You're destroyed. You're dead. You're somewhere--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm in another plane of existence probably.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're having a real rough week right now is what you're having.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My arm is dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're the only person alive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cheers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Victor) What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cheers, Victor!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, cheers. Salut, bitches! (cheering)

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Happy Halloween! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't breathe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that's it. That's the show.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need my hand to do that. This is, by the way, pre-finger loss Victor. As I know there will be some purists out there like, why does he have all his fingers on his right hand? Matt, you're so inaccurate to your own character.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so first and foremost, tonight's episode is sponsored by Loot Crate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Loot Crate! (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get your maps off the table, Tyriok.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We've got an unboxing to do here with their last theme here. But before we get to that, Sam did you want to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wanted to say guys that this month's theme for Loot Crate is magic. And I don't have much planned for tonight, but I did learn a magic trick. I'm going to do a magic trick. It's my first magic trick I've ever done. And I don't have a deck of cards at home, so I'm going to use spell cards instead. I'm going to give it a little shuffle here. Oh, hey there, cowboy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, please let something come out of your mouth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taliesin, can you give it a shuffle?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll give it a shuffle. Liam, do you want to shuffle?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, I've got it. We got 30 minutes, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get ready for November's enchanting theme: Magical! We've cast a powerful, ancient spell to deliver you this 100% exclusive crate. Featuring bewitching items from Doctor Strange, Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them, Big Trouble in Little China. And more! Use the promo link: lootcrate.com/criticalrole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Cosby impression) You see!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no, no, you can't take that back!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to look at this half of the card deck and it'll tell me what's in the other half of the card deck. Okay. I know, Taliesin, by looking at that, that the fourth card down is See Invisibility.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The fourth card down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The fourth card down is See Invisibility.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, this card here will be--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will be See Invisibility!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like Nicholas Cage as a cat. It is, in fact, See Invisibility! (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Remarkable Nicholas Cage impersonator, too, it's really amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My mouth hurts so much right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam. Thank you, Loot Crate! Yeah, open your Loot Crates.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These are from October. These are not the current ones.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: These are not the magic theme.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's the horror theme.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is what everyone should be getting this month.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that's the coolest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are those Freddy Kruger chopsticks?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's pretty badass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Little chibi Leatherface!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of all the things you thought could never be cute. Leatherface.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Little Leatherface.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have to see if these are actually usable or not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Negan shirt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got it! It's off!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done, Liam, well done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Camp Crystal Lake.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, a little pennant. My son will love that, big fan of the movie.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to wear this for my kids all the time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Regrettable Supervillains.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Too soon, guys, too soon. Just too soon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Preying Mantis man. Cat Girl.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Camp Crystal Lake, oh that makes me happy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These chopsticks are amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The chopsticks are awesome, but don't try to pick up metal dice with them because they're way too heavy.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Don't eat metal dice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, the Walking Dead t-shirt. I call dibs on this next week!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Thank you very much, Loot Crate, for sponsoring us. You can go to lootcrate.com/criticalrole.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Promo code "criticalrole."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beginner's luck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good job.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That one's going to fail you every time, now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would have been impressive. Next up, let's see. GM Tips. We now have the second episode that just went up on YouTube. They go up a couple of days early on Alpha if you want to check that out. The most recent episode deals with improvisation, dealing with the unexpected. I'm a big fan of this new run. We get to go a little more in-depth with the elements of running your own games at home. So, if you're a GM, check them out. They come out every week, we have new ones coming out for the next six or so weeks. I can't remember how many episodes we did. So, for a while, so every week, a new one coming. Alpha on Tuesdays or Wednesdays, and then on Thursdays on YouTube, so check that out. Next up here we have Titanfall 2 came out!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Titanfall 2!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fun. I play Jack Cooper, your protagonist in the single-player campaign. It's basically a future buddy cop film with a giant robot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You sound sexy in that, man. Just saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You do!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: High noon!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Victor) It's how I like it! I'm like this the entire game!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a whole different Titanfall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm in there too! I've returned from the first game as Barker and I will yell at you if you're in my faction. Damn, that's got some weight to it, son! Mmm!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At least a d8.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (explosion noise)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that was the end of Tyriok.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Tyriok) I shot something else off!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Oh god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah! Telltale's Batman episode three came out. I really like the way that's going. Fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's some good stuff happening in that episode.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who is this Batman character?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So many good things are already out there. You guys have been crazy!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. There's been some really phenomenal--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I enter the contest as this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe you already have, and you can win all of your shirts back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic. Marisha. There is a new Signal Boost episode.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you make a cameo in the latest episode.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I stare at a mirror. It's fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Go watch for Halloween.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Travis. How about Talks Machina?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can follow him at Brian Wayne Foster something something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like @brianwfoster.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to be on there; it's our chance to give insight after the game. It'll be a weekly thing so we can answer questions that people might have, talk about moments that happened, how it went well, how it didn't, how we suck. There will always be a few of us on there every week, we might even have some guests, and some segments! It's going to be awesome. It's something we've been wanting to do for a while--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. And Brian's a really awesome guy so we're excited about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. You guys are going to love him. He is great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Brian is awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Hai!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Take your glove off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take it off! Take that glove off!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're doing that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's no fake hand!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That ring better be there!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He put a ring on it! (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Applause, applause, applause!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Victor) So excited!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Congratulations!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, he doesn't have to take it off!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Victor) Only parts of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to do a Critical Role themed wedding?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's not going to be a thing. But we have already decided on our date.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Although I might still have Travis Willingham as my flower girl. Doing the dust of tracelessness.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would be honored.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So cute!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll start writing my Best Man speech. It'll be a song.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the limericks in one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Delivered in tiger?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Delivered in tiger makeup.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's "later."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jumped the gun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, I don't know how we're going to do this. I got to look right at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look directly below. Maybe stare at his eyes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's missing so many teeth!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We got to go shopping or drinking or something, nothing serious for the love of Sarenrae.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So! As you guys reconvene towards Scanlan's Magnificent Mansion to prepare for the next leg of your journey, what do you wish to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we're in the Mansion right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we're at the top of the ravine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're preparing to go through a portal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, you guys are. So you've gathered to go ahead and make--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you want to sleep before we went back to Whitestone?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I can go. Yeah, no. It's been eight hours, I've done my thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, for the restoring some of the farmland, yeah. Which as you complete the entirety of the spell, you watch as the rest of the snow melt begins to turn to water, and you watch as the land itself grows more fertile and the crops begin to pop forth. Like you began to see when the ritual initiated itself. With the completion of the land cleansed, you are free to go to the next length of your journey.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stop, I can't make eye contact. I'm sorry, it's okay. We'll get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think you look great, Matt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You look like Doc Brown exploded, I don't know what to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pat that tuft of hair down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marty! Okay. Happy Halloween.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 30 more minutes, 30 more minutes and we'll settle down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have to get immune to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to set the Deathwalker's Ward to Matthew's costume.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you take a short rest to set your-- (laughs).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's from Vasselheim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What else do you guys wish to do? What's the next step in your journey?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean we got to go back to Whitestone, right away? Is there anything else to do here? Is there anything to deliver, any piece of any body to take with us? Anything? We got everything already?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to deliver Ripley's arm back in Ank'Harel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That needs to happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kashaw's in Vasselheim.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to do something about him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He might be in Whitestone by now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He might be back. He might be on his way here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's a dick, he can take care of himself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hopefully, he won't just loose something on the Ravenites here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's get out of here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They've been through so much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean it's really reconfirming his whole life-view so, you know. Hi!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm having trouble.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Keyleth! Cast your thing and let's get the fuck out of here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's get on to Whitestone. Get on getting on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm coming, boo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the blue slowly transitioning into a light orange to a yellow as the sunrise is making its way over the mountain range that surrounds the outside of Whitestone. You're met with a few wandering guards that wander through the town that acknowledge your presence, but it is your call as to what you wish to do now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does the town look like it's safe and intact?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems like it hasn't suffered any sort of incursion or attack, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, yeah. That's good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've only been gone for what? 24 hours?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, like two days because we slept there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: About two days.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go check and see if I can find Kash.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we should drop off some of our spoils.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Our loot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where? Where do we drop them off at?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The castle?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would imagine the treasury room is where it can be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a treasury vault in the Whitestone castle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Cool. Yeah. Totally knew about that place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cold, brisk morning air is immediately met with that warm ray of sun hitting you and it's welcoming both to be returning to a place of comfort but also the transition into day itself is a very warm and welcoming experience. As you step towards the front, there are four guards at the front gate. They step aside to let you in. As you step into the main foyer of the area, you already see a familiar sight. You see there waiting, arms crossed, leaning against the wall, Seeker Asum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scars still on the face?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, still acid-pocked scar across the right side, ruining the tattooed face. The rest of the castle seems relatively quiet at this time, as it is very early.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's the only one--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within the actual foyer of the castle, yes, the main entrance area. As you guys begin to step inside, Seeker Asum steps in your direction. Steps in your direction, and Kima is already taking a brisk walk in that direction and goes, pointing outward toward Seeker Asum. "Now--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab Kima by the wrist. Not right now, maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now you told me you'd already met with a creature. This is the--" At which point, Seeker Asum's hands rest on to Kima's shoulder. Kima's head whips around to face Asum, and Asum says, "You need not worry."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to try a thing on her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She doesn't like it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's going to the sheets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima's eyes blink for a moment and she--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No no no no no no. I still have my hands on Kima, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you begin to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, we're going to start a fight, that's going to start a fight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want her to fucking cast any shit on Kima.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if it was just a chill out spell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's probably a charm spell. Or a memory spell. No, I don't want to fucking wait--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a Counterspell, but you can try to cast it on her to see if it has any effect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima turns to look at you and goes, "What-- why "would-- I'm sorry, I went groggy there for a second. We've had a long day. Good to see you, "Asum." And Asum nods and says, "Well, the pleasure is mine. Glad to see you all made it back safe and sound."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes we did. Thank you, Asum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have a meeting set here in the next two hours to gather our information and best situate "the next plan of action. You also have a friend waiting for you. Your armored Kashaw returned but "a half day ago apparently. Sleeping at the moment should you be interested in waking him from his "slumber and notifying him of his, well, his services no longer being needed."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did he return alone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He did. And rather proud with his findings."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. Where are you off to now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I'm here waiting for the meeting."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lovely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And who all is going to be a part of this meeting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As far as I know, it's going to be myself, Cassandra, Allura, and Drake."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good! Allura, we haven't seen her in forever. Have we?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We saw her pretty recently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did. Shit. Yes, we did. Never mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Well then, until the meeting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Until the meeting. Now, food should be ready." And Asum steps out into the sunshine and closes his eyes, takes a deep breath as the sun rays hit and looks over his shoulder, smiles, and continues to walk down the path in towards Whitestone itself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can kill him right here, right now!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no. (coughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then again, we did kill a dragon! And that is

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We did. Yeah. And you got a brilliant new sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which she pulls out and (swish). You can see the arc of light streak across the blade as she flings it in the air with incredible strength for a halfling of her size. She's still marveled by it. "You know what? I'm not going to sleep. I'm going to go practice!" And she goes and runs off down one of the hallways towards one of the castle's training rooms.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, Kima, Kima! You don't hear anything when you use that, do you? Like voices or someone talking to you or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She holds the blade up to her ear. "No."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Enjoy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thanks, Grog!" Slaps you on the shoulder with an awkward glance and continues the excited steps forward into vanishing somewhere into the castle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The sword is clean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Dodged a bullet on that one!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should put that hide in the Treasury.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hide?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The 140 pounds of dragonhide you're carrying right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh right! I'm dragging it behind me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like a body in a carpet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I'm off to deposit this hide!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good object work!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Boy, I'm going to need to switch shoulders! Getting a little roll in the ol' righty there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth grabs Vax as they wander off and pulls him behind the rest of the crowd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's track Raishan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's track her. Let's just do it right now. Let's kill her. We can do it, she won't be expecting it. We can find her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull her further away. She won't expect it, but she is a fucking ancient being.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But she's sick and she-- We can do it right now. When she's not armed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth, I want to kill a dragon as much as you do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not about killing a dragon, it's about killing

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know, but we want it to work. We want her to die. And if you and I do it, it's not going to happen. Her being sick is still up here. We need the others. I really want to use both my arms to take her, but I can't. I take her by the arms. And we need the others. If I thought we could do it-- Listen to me. I love you, and if you ask me again, I will go with you. But I don't think it will work. I think you and I will die. I think Raishan will spit on our bodies. You will not get what you want. And then Thordak won't die. No one will be happy. I understand--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just want this to be over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want this to be over.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to stay with the others; there's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Okay. I understand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: After this, if you tell me to go in, you say the word. It's not like I haven't tried to throw my life away already. You think I wouldn't do it for you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like it's very telling when Grog has more patience than I. (sighs) Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey. It'll happen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just don't want to wait so long that she gets the upper hand on us. The longer we wait, the more she learns about us. The more we're letting her in, the more we're revealing. I feel like the longer we wait, the closer is her inevitable betrayal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pulls her in and touch foreheads. I don't think we're going to be waiting for long; I really don't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Let's catch up with the others.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you, what have you been up to?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I pull Percy aside and say, we can kill her right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ugh! It's a tiger!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we got to go to the treasury.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to go to the treasury.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then what? Who do we need to check in with? Everyone, right? Gilmore and Kash and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got a couple hours.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a couple hours. We need to talk to people. We need to find out where this meeting's being held, if it's being held downstairs or if it's being held in the battle room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It won't be if Asum has anything to say about it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, maybe he won't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And what is this meeting? I know that we have to have a conversation with Asum.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but what is this about?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This meeting may be the beginning of something very violent or this may be the start of something; I don't know. But be prepared perhaps that this meeting may be on moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Be prepared.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't think about it. Don't plan. Don't have any thoughts in your head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Improvise. We're good at that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can't lie about anything. Do not lie to her about anything. And one of the ways we can lie best is by truthfully saying we have no plans against her right now because we have no plans against her right now. The more we talk, the more she will be able to perceive our deceptions, if we have any. Be very careful. This is going to be very dangerous. There's going to be a lot of improvisation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hate knowing that she's going to be able to hear all of our plans.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sighs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Honestly, we should have assumed that they could hear all of our plans from the beginning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) My fault, really. Well, we are very good at being spied on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, well, we like to talk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And even if we do, even if we were to get rid of her, there's no sense in believing that they still don't know everything we're doing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Then we'll see what

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And let's hope that we're downstairs, and if we're not downstairs, there's still options.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you've finally caught up with the group. You've managed to drop off your large amount of dragon hide in return.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit, that skin weighs a ton. Good thing I'm strong as fuck. What'd I miss?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a cold place in the treasure room? Wait, this hide is going to be cured, or smoked, or something, whatever you do. Stretched?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's got scales all over it. I mean that stays, right? It doesn't have to be kept cold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, it probably should be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kept cold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It probably should be attended to in a short amount of time, like in the next week or so, before it's really--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would it be an armorer, or a blacksmith, or-- who works with dragonhide?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taliesin, what's the old fashioned word for the guy who does the hide stuff?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tanner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A tanner! Thank you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there a tanner in Whitestone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One would assume we have a tanner in Whitestone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a few tanners, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it super cold where I dropped off the hide? Like is it below ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's below ground. Yeah, it's not--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A bit chilly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Comparatively. Whitestone in general is a pretty chilly place, so yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But not like a fake-bake. We want a real tanner, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, while they're talking about all this, can I stealth away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can. Make a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll use Luck. 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28. Okay, yeah. You vanish without anybody else noticing your disappearance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to go as quickly as I can towards Gilmore's house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's cheating on you, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Look, it's 2016.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we decide what we do about Raish--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (shushing)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seeker Asum?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to talk, we're going to listen, and we're going to be prepared for anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, so we're not (death noises and farts)?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not just yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to talk, we're going to listen, and be prepared for anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was that last sound the sound of Seeker Asum's bowels?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's open to interpretation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. After he dies, letting it all out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Just want to be fancy. I lean that way but, you know. Cannot speak for other people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The work speaks for itself, really.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fair enough. Vax, as you rush down towards the homestead that Gilmore had made here in Whitestone, the door is closed. There's a large pile out front of ruined furniture that's been jammed into this collection. Presumably from the last encounter they had when the incursion of assassins made their way in. But the door's closed, and seemingly locked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (knocks)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Mario coin sound)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's him, that's magic!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you find a cool coin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (knocks)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Eventually you hear a little rustling, and you hear a voice, muffled, from the upper floor say, "Confound it, I'll be right down!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm so scared of this with that hair on your head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good morning." (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know what to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why did I do this? Tonight?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now you know why.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, this is not fair. Can I come in to talk? Quickly, I have to head back to the others.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. Would you like some tea?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. I don't even have time, I just want to talk to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd like some tea. Come on in, come on in."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He ushers you to enter, and leads you to one of the small chairs. And he walks back into the kitchen, shouting over his shoulder, "So! Vax'ildan, please. Tell me what's on your mind."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, we're getting closer to the end game here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "I certainly hope so. It's taken a couple years off my lifespan."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just killed another one of the dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Really?!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How many is that for you now? Three?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, what brings you here this early in the "morning, friend?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I don't think I've treated you fairly. But I wasn't playing games. Shaun. It's been a little weird lately, and I understand why, but I want you to know that I love you as a dear, dear friend, and I really don't think I'm going to be here in a few days. And I would hate to think that I would be--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I'm thankful for the connection that we do have. And yes, heartbreak comes. But heartbreak "goes. It's part of life. It just means that I need to find somebody who's a little more my speed."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That guy'll be fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kill a dragon. Another. Kill two more. Kill six "more, I don't care! Just know that you're coming back, because I need you and your friends to keep "pimping out my name."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. Whoever gets you will be a very lucky man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know. I know."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Love you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know. You sure you don't want any tea?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm really nauseous right now. I almost didn't come here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Waste not, want not. (sips) Now go! Stop being "uncomfortable in front of me! I need to get my morning--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "--situated."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Goodbye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stands there. Waves his hand and the door opens on its own.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes you by the shoulder real fast before you leave, and turns around and goes, "'Till next time. Say it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 'Till next time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Door slams behind you. You make your way back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry I made you do that in that skullcap, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From my perspective, this is easy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Training. This is all training. It's training at a thousand times gravity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) It totally is! Like performing arts with the weights on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Been doing this since the 80s and 90s, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to find Kashaw. Before the meeting, yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I set off. To find Kashaw with Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go back to his door. It's closed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (knocks)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (loudly) Are you sleeping?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Break down the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kash?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to jiggle the lock. Is it locked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not locked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I open it. Just a crack, and look in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hope you're not naked!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you open it up, there's no light on the inside, but the light does come in as you slowly open the door with a (squeaks). You can see he's halfway out of his armor, passed out on his back, on the bed. He's one arm out, snoring loudly like he was too tired to make it all the way, and (snores).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we let him sleep or should we talk to him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He snores.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, my brother doesn't snore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ew.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I mean I don't--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, just don't, just don't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love you, Travis.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I have any like stones or any like rocks or anything in my bag or--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to throw a rock at him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, just to see if he wakes up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can't just poke him? That seems so weird, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're an archer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I don't want to kill him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why don't we just tap on his shoulder?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll sneak in, tap his shoulder, come back out, see if he wakes up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's what I want to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want him to know that, you know--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That we did that? Sure. I'll stand on the outside and look unsuspecting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to sneak in and tickle his little foot and walk out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, he still has his boots on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's more like his upper torso, he got partway out of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I tickle his hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay so you're opening his palm--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tickle his hands and then go back really fast to the doorway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you tickle his hand. No response.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (snores)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I flick his nose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you flick his nose and you start to back away, there's a blur of motion as suddenly he comes leaping out of the bed (grunts) and goes over and grabs his spear, his hand reaches for nothing in the air, and slings it forward in your direction, (whoosh) bypassing by your face by a few inches. And he looks still half awake, going (startled noises).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, it's my room."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I keep doing that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know; it's awkward.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi." And he throws his spear to the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh good, I was wondering if--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I hope we didn't-- I hope you weren't sleeping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hope I wasn't either. Sure, all right, I'm glad you're here because it took me a long-ass "time to get here." And he sits up in the bed and-- or he sits down back on the bed and reaches over and pulls out one of his packs and brings out a couple of rolls of paper. "Okay, so I talked to "Vanessa and got two contracts that we could take up for this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We got one here," and he pulls it out, "This is for two indigenous creatures to the "region that you were talking about over by Wildemount. One is a purple worm matron."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, that sounds big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Supposedly. Shit's dangerous. Careful. This one is for a Storm Giant. This one is a little "harder to get a hold of apparently."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're so hard to get a hold of. We should probably focus on the other one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unless Vorugal's already dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, wouldn't that be crazy if he was already dead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What would we do with these contracts if he is? Just wondering about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Get out of my room."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just get out."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Get out of my room."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your help has been--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not overlooked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Out. Of my room."

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: We should probably go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want these back--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Out of my room."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to set them down on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Out of my room."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, we could--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Get out of my room."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By the way, you might want to get like a mouthguard or something because you snore a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling) "Out of my room!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, we should go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Okay. We'll see you later.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I take her around a corner. He kissed me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kash?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! God no! Percy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percival!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did I miss something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Percy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (squeals)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean I know you guys are like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pretty close and I don't know if that's weird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why are you asking me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, you're like his sister, kind of.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's not my twin brother.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is true. How are things with you and Vax? Thanks for bringing it up. Is it good?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still worry if you care.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I care; of course I care.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you say that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hug her. Well not your antlers in my face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, sorry, sorry, that happens a lot. I'm very happy for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey thanks. We should go look at the treasury.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, let's go to the treasury. We should go victory shopping.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think he'd mind if we-- I mean we have so much money, we don't even need to do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean it's basically our money, though, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. No. It's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys wander your way off--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, Vex, I feel like you might be a bad or good influence on me. I'm not sure, but I like it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's all good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, Grog, Percival. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Life is failing the Bechdel Test so hard right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry. (laughs) Carry on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sometimes they do talk about boys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They are like 50% of--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I did not see that coming.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't really need to like check in with anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean do you have the gold?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well I mean I-- yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should probably divvy it up, don't you think?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? What? What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But it's really a lot to hold onto your person. I mean, it's a bag of gold--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but we should all replenish our personal--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can have some pocket money, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, yes, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. How much do you want? You don't have it. I have it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 5000. We have hundreds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, if you want 5000. Do you have good credit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have good credit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never misspent a single coin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I have your last four pay stubs, please? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here's two of them right here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey! That's good enough! Have 5000 gold!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Grog gives you 5000 gold, which weighs roughly a hundred pounds--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It weighs more than you do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 5000 gold is a hundred pounds?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it's probably about 1000 because I can't count to 5000.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. He starts divvying it out until it's like larger than you in a pile in the center of the room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well what are you going to do with it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, all right. I'm going to give some back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you give me ten platinum.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! Absolutely--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (chuckles) It's the same! It's the same!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why not?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten platinum?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten platinum is an awful lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But he can carry ten. That's easier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold on, let me consult Blackstone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten or ten thousand?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (stage whisper) Don't do it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Stoneblack says it's all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're with us. You're with us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take the gold. I put it back in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I give him ten platinum, which is actually six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you get six platinum from Grog, which is roughly sixty gold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One. Three. Seven. Eight. Nine. 40. Ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And give me 500 gold, as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course. I need money.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's really heavy. How about I give you 20 more platinum?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. That sounds good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I give him four more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) Give me 50 more platinum.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. I give you one more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. 11 platinum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try to find Allura. I'm going to leave them to their madness. I'm going to try and find Allura and Cassandra or anybody I can find in the castle at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you walk around, nobody else who's supposed to be meeting has gathered yet. However, Cassandra is awake and in the process of going through some papers. She has her personal guard at her side and two guards at the door and you can see she's getting herself prepared for the meeting. As you enter the room, the door partially ajar, you see her still down currently thumbing through notes. Her hair is still in disarray and pulled back haphazardly. And she's wearing her morning gown and without even looking up goes, "Percival. Glad you've arrived and still in one piece."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. And down one dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have to tell you, I'm very impressed."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. Two more to go. It's going to get a little heavier at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Indeed. That's what our meeting is about."

lines.name: IPHONE
lines.text: What was that, again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What was that, again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're making a nuisance. Continue, please."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two more to go. I fear that it's possible that Whitestone itself may eventually be a target of an attack. I feel it may be inevitable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is, actually, what our meeting is about. Prevent that from happening."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quickly to check. I would know what languages Cassandra spoke, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What languages do you know?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Elven, Celestial, Common.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She knows Elven and Common. She does not know Celestial.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was more your hobby.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I figured. That was my guess. I wanted to confirm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hand her a small slip of paper that I have written in Elven: "Be prepared for anything "today. Keep silent."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Understandably so. But she takes and looks over the sheet and goes, "Well, very well. Should be an interesting meeting then."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do think so. It's good to see you taking command.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's good to see you, and I look forward to you sharing some of the burden soon."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quite possibly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will discuss whence the dragons are taken care of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will discuss, at the very least, relieving you of some of this burden.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know it is not fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whatever is fair in this life? The wonders of lordship and ladydom."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to run off and try to find Jarett.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Do you wish to come? Anything else you want to bring to this conversation?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm fine with that. My last thing is, I'm going to quickly run and have a quick conversation privately with-- I assume we have some sort of royal jeweler of some kind, or somebody who does some of the ornamental work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No one who lives on site per se, but there are two individuals that your family generally used for various forms of jewel craft.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to write and send a letter off for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. No worries. Scanlan, what are you going to do? Looking for Jarett?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Looking for Jarett.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You head outside of the main castle, down to where the training barracks are for Whitestone. And you can see Jarett's already out there, with a small, metallic platter on his lap, scarfing up some food real fast. He's gotten his day started relatively early and as soon as you approach, mouth's already full. "Mmm! Scanlan! It's good to see you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good to see you too! What're you enjoying there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "The usual gruel that you find in this city."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I thought it might be something, meat-based that you could have popped up a bit with your spice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, well trust me, I've used it on the eggs and it makes it "bearable. Whitestone is not well known for its cuisine from what I can tell. Everything's gray "and lacks flavor."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll invite you over to my house some time, give you a proper chicken dinner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, I will happily take you up on that offer, thank you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wanted to check in on (lowers voice) the task we talked about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The task?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, the mission we discussed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Remind me again?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you know there was some illicit--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Items of medicine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, I sent a request through someone I know."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sent a request?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not going to leave the city right now to go find-- Look, I have two "people I know that might be able to get what you need. But it's going to take time."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighs) I don't have time. (sighs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "When did you pick up this habit?! I'm worried about you now, Scanlan."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I haven't picked it up. I'm trying to pick it up, damn it! It's the most difficult habit to pick up! Listen, can I confide in you, man to man, one on one, here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Certainly."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're a fighter, you're a strapping young battle man, aren't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "I have been told this once or twice, yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I haven't felt myself recently. You know, we have these fights and some of them are pretty epic and there's monsters involved and I'm usually on my game, but lately I'm feeling a little off! How do

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well largely by not using illicit substances?!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't judge! Don't judge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He got

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't really do that much anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe that's why you're not feeling up to the task?" (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is a very fair point, Jarett.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm just saying. Look, and I do not mean to talk out of turn." He sets his meal aside. "But you are a man who walks, driven by his pelvis. Am I wrong?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're not wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then what happens if the pelvis goes unused? Grows bashful?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Preach.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a fine instrument, it can go untuned. If you leave a fine violin without playing it for many years, it could wither and rot until you need to replace some of the parts. In a way, the same is true for my member. But the problem here, Jarett, is that I'm distracted. I'm distracted by things that haven't ever distracted me before. I've made a promise to someone to stay alive. I've never valued my own life before and when we get into the shit, I'm second-guessing things. I'm making stupid decisions that I wouldn't have otherwise made.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because suddenly you have purpose. Because you have a reason to come back."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's not a bad thing, then."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know how to harness that kind of stress.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you have a keepsake of this reason to return, this person you made a promise to?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have a keepsake? I don't think so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then you need to get yourself a keepsake!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well she's not around right now to get a keepsake from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then something else that reminds you of her. Something that you can look at in that "moment when you're not so sure."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did you get so wise, Jarett?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Drink a lot, listen to people talk. There are none wiser than barkeeps, my friend, and I "have been friends with many a barkeep."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So if you can please continue to look for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will continue searching and providing what you require."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've heard that it can help people in moments of panic and stress.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I've watched it ruin lives near K'Tawl Swamp!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can handle a lot of things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are a strange gnome."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Takes one to know one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Does not work in this circumstance but I applaud your attempt. It was good. I'll do what I "can. But don't forget you have more than one reason to stick around."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know. That's what worries me. I'll think about what you said. Maybe I'll go have a toss, see if that helps, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here, tell you what. Come here."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he suckerpunches you in the face. You unexpectedly fall back. You feel the pulsing of the blood run to your cheek. Your eyesight goes white for a second. He goes, "See, now you have to "live to return the favor."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You! That was clever. I will definitely get you back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. I look forward to it."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Watch your back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I always do."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get me some drugs!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome. Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's daytime, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's early morning.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a way I can find a courtyard or an open-air area?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a couple of courtyards within the perimeter walls of the castle. They have some small garden elements.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I get there, are there a lot of guards keeping an eye?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not within the courtyard, no. Occasionally, there'll be one patrolling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I pee in the courtyard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By all means!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is home for us, and I peed all over Greyskull Keep. I left little puddles that y'all didn't know about. It's real important in case other goliaths come around and are like, (sniff) "Nope, the wolf's here. I got to go elsewhere."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I assumed it was shoddy masonry and everything was leaking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, stealth roll, motherfucker. Can I take a leak on a wall in the courtyard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah and there are a number of walls to choose from: varying heights, different levels of masonry. You have the veritable pick of the litter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I find the highest wall with the most ornate decoration on it and go slightly off left? The way me member goes and make a little box right there? A little waterfall on the whitestone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There isn't a whole lot in the way of ornate craftsmanship on the exterior of the castle or the walls, but you feel, as far as your interest, Grog, this is a good wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You mark your territory expertly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In a wide, arcing pattern, not like the one shot, like a nice, upside-down crown.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, like a Cylon eyebeam. Yeah, totally. You do so with gusto. Congratulations.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. Home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's how Grog spells home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stellar RP.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How else do you spell home?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless there's anything else that needs to be done--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not done with my errands. Can I go find Kynan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. Kynan, who is currently under the watch of Jarett at the moment, is asleep. You start walking towards the direction as Scanlan is leaving the exterior of the barrack training grounds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, buddy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You look a little rough. You all right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm fine. One of our employees punched me in the face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't want to know. It wasn't the cooking cook.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You look really tense. You look out of character.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (growls)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh dear. Head back. We're going to have that meeting soon. Get your game face on, yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will. I'll wash my face. Get to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Best I've been in a while.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's good to hear. It's been a while since we had one of our depressing chats. You seem a little more chipper these days. Coming around to my perspective, are you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I make an insight check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, make an insight check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seems full of shit to me. I'm going to use luck. I've got it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's your second luck!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who cares? This is a game. I'm with my friends. I'm having fun. That is an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. Are you deceiving him any?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! Not at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But does he seem confident and happy is what I wanted to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As much as he would in the given situation, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. (sighs) I'm happy. I'm in love.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I know the fella?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'll tell you later, all right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want to hear details! Dirty, dirty details! Sweaty details!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, he is so hung. Unbelievably hung.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So much dick talk!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll tell you later. I have to run an errand. We have to get to this fucking meeting, yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah. I'll see you there. Game face on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this how they talk themselves up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, don't women talk about their vaginas?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jeepers. Off I go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Locker room talk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (yells) No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The campaign is over. Whitestone burns in flames. You make your way there. Jarett, you can see, finishing a meal. Looks over to you. There's nobody else in the training area. It's still relatively early. You do, with your perception, see back on the main stone building, you see a few individuals walking back and forth in front of one of the windows. It looks like things are starting up over there for training for the day. Jarett finishes his meal, scarfs up the last bit of egg on the side of the plate, "Hey!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jarett!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, I don't want to interrupt. Kynan, the new guy. Is he around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably inside, sleeping or waking."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay if I go in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure. This way."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just be a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very basic breakfast meats being cooked. Some of them are around tables talking, hunched forward and laughing. As soon as you walk in, a few of them turn and look at you. Some don't recognize you, some do. You see, in the far corner sitting alone at one of the tables is Kynan, who is prison-style guarding his food and eating by himself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right towards him. Hey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How are you fitting in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Everyone here's been fine."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You hanging back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, as much as I need to. This is still a lot. Jarett's been good. He's been watching."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's a good man. Yeah, I get it. We killed another dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That-- wow."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I don't want you to question your decision here, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I mean-- I don't have anything else right now really. So, what's the question?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's no question. But if you could, I have two favors I want to ask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First one is, after I leave here today, could you embrace these people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, I'm trying."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When I walk out of here, I want you to work on letting go of that. For real! Leap of faith kind of shit. Just let go of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) "Well, I'll do my best."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know. Scratch that, three favors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks down a little bit for a second seeming like "oh boy."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I know I'm a handful. The second one, I don't even need for you to say anything about this, but you know the white-haired guy I travel with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. He's got a sister, and I don't want you to do anything other than keep an eye on her and keep her safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the last thing. You've got those knives I gave you, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, hold onto them. I trust you. I need you to watch after one last thing thing for me, all right? It's

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's been with me through a lot, and I don't want him at the bottom of a ditch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you sure?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have never been more sure of anything in my life. I want you to have him, and I want you to take care of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll do that. It'll be done. I promise."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kynan, I need you to believe in second chances.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's all I have to keep me going right now." He reaches his hand up towards the snake, and Simon leaps from from your hand to his and swirls down his arm. He looks confused for a second as it wraps around his waist and then forms into the shape of a belt. You now see a few other guys in the room, and the room's got a little bit quieter. They're all watching what's happening, "What's going on?" He notices the attention and, "I'll take good care of him."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I believe you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean no offense. It's a lot of attention right now."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I give a slap on his cheek. Remember everything I said, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, I will."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a good kid. (whack)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (soft chuckle) "Same temple."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll see you later, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point in time, a number of pages have been sent throughout the city to gather those who've been wandering about Whitestone, as you are being called to the meeting in the second floor war room held within the castle itself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same one where you met with--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Asum? That'll do. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be ready for anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go Krogering! The best of everything!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before we walk in, I grab Grog. How do you do it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're able to utilize your rage when necessary. How do you keep it suppressed when it's not needed?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah. Well, good question.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Please enlighten me, Professor Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I'm going to help you. And I'm going to high five you when it's done. But until then, you keep that shit tucked inside. Let it build. And then when the time is right, you let her have it. And I'll throw you into the fray, when the time is right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Promise?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I promise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Deal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (cracking noise) (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ow! Ow, Grog! Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, sorry! I'm so sorry!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's fine. I appreciate it. It's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Bruises, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, you take a hit point of damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh man, people are going to ask questions about that later.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's cool. You make up a really good story.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But listen. If at any time it gets to be too much, you just go. We've got you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I don't want to let you guys down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You won't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Grog. Okay. (clears throat) Let's do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys enter the war room, same as it was previously left. However, you are brought the image of the table in early morning: Allura, Gilmore, surprisingly, Drake Thunderbrand, Cassandra, as well as Asum, who's standing behind most of them, back to the window. They all, middle of conversation, turn, and smile as you begin to walk in. You see Gilmore nods to everybody. Gives an extra smile to you, Vax. Cassandra's waiting for the pleasantries to end. Allura comes up and takes your hand, and she goes, "It's wonderful to see that you've returned safely. I've had many "terrible thoughts that perhaps this meeting would not be as positive, and I'm very glad to know that "I was wrong. And that you brought Kima back to us as well. Pike is safe as well. So congratulations, "I guess, are in order. Come, sit. These circumstances do press our timeline a bit." And you see there are a number of other chairs already brought into the room, prepared for you guys to sit around together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there anyone sitting next to Raishan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I sit next to Raishan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Raishan is not sitting. Raishan is standing with her arms crossed, leaning against the window.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to stay standing as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I move closer to Raishan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you approach, you see Asum's eyes watch you. Small grin on the face, and a little nod.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I give a nod back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pull a chair out for Asum, and I'm going to offer him the chair and sit. And pull one out extra for myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point Cassandra gathers all of your attention in the midst of this chaos. "The "excursion to Wildemount went well. As far as I understand, you are now one more dragon-slaying "into this chaotic endeavor. Well done. Tell me, how did this happen?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A deal was made with the locals. We brought the dragon to an appointed kill spot outside of the city. We summoned a creature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With the Gate scroll that we showed you, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was more or less how it went down. It was a simple trap, it was elegant, and we barely survived.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull out the Spire of Conflux and hand it to her. We retrieved this in our spoils. You may recognize it as one of the Vestiges that we spoke of earlier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cassandra takes it and says, "It looks quite important. Allura."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry. It was meant for Allura.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can see how this would be confusing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You look just like Allura right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Allura, is everything okay? Have you been through some shit, Allura?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I almost did Allura, too. Next Halloween.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax is leaning against the door to this chamber, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps we'll take a look at it after the meeting together."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we have to begin to gather our strengths, our "allies. And honestly, I think we need to strike first."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, otherwise we wait for the fight to be on Thordak's turf."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's unexpected.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just pop on over to Emon, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we need a plan first. We need to gather those we've called to arms. We need to "assess what strengths we have, and utilizing all of these things at our disposal, come up with an "idea of how we're actually going to do this." Gilmore steps in and goes, "If we are to strike, I "agree it should also be very soon. We've pushed the boundaries of being on his peripheral even "this long. And you say that he knows your faces, correct?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "His gaze will now surely fall upon the seven of you, at the very least."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was inevitable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He will tear through Daxio. He will begin to burn everything that Tal'Dorei is, until we show our faces."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am curious what the Master of Secrets thinks. Asum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asum is still walking a circle around the table.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you propose we do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmph. Well, before we get to that, let us discuss things we have at our disposal, the "information we have, and from that, we can garnish a plan. I am the Master of Secrets; I am not a Master "of Warmongering and Attack."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I get up, I walk to the window, and I look out the window. We're not going to be safe here for much longer, that much is certain. We will need to move quickly.

lines.name: MATT
