lines.text: Drake speaks up for the first time and goes, "Aye, not to mention that slippery green drake is "still out there somewhere, and we have no idea where it is. Two members of the Conclave are "remaining."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well-- Ow! Right, yeah. Two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you think perhaps it's best to skip one and hope for the element of surprise? Maybe he thinks we're going to finish off his generals before we come to him. It may be a

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cut off the head of the king?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thordak, from what I understand, is extremely powerful and influential. That Raishan dragon is a mere pittance in comparison. A small, exponential ant, a pawn, if you will, on the battlefield.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I certainly hope so. And if that's the case, then I think you're right. Go for the king "first. But we must do so with eyes all about us because the last thing we need is to be flanked by "that beast in the center of our attack."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Exactly. We don't want to deal with two ancient dragons.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we lure it somewhere else, perhaps?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If we knew where it fucking was." Allura speaks up at this point and goes, "Look. I know "that Thordak's hate for me still burns, hence the reason why they went directly for my tower when "they first arrived in Emon. The one trump card we do have in this is me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to offer yourself as bait?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If need be. I'm not saying that's the right plan, but I'm saying it is one thing we can "perhaps utilize in our plan, in our strategy."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is his hate for you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think-- There was a ship in Draconia, a northern ship of some kind. I still feel there may be some sort of weapon inside it that may prove useful. It was a ship that had been dragged there by the white dragon. It's been bothering me. And then of course we have whatever it is we have downstairs. I'm not saying we should use it, but it is powerful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how we would use it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can't move it, can we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't touch it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gilmore pops up again and says, "Exactly. We were poring over that thing for a number of "weeks, until we had to build this barrier. And to be perfectly honest, I am sick of it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got nothing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we understand it's a siphon. It's bringing the energy of the nexus somewhere. We "don't know where the other end of it is. Or if it's even functioning properly."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Allura, do you still feel a connection with the soul stone that's inside of Thordak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I have no personal connection to it, I know that I was the architect of its enchantment, "and the ruse, of which sealed it within Thordak."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You built it. You must know of some way to disable it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or a weakness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We designed it to have no weakness. The intent was to keep him there indefinitely. Perhaps "if we could--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Asum. You said you have friends, back in Emon still, that have been gathering intel." Asum turns. "Yes, actually. And I was hoping that, as part of our plan today, we could even go and "retrieve some of this information. Perhaps that could teach us more about this soul anchor you "continuously talk about."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How can we retrieve this information without going to Emon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, we would have to go to Emon."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That sounds crazy. Is there any way to not do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps I'll go alone."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The soul stone has been broken and abused before. I have a feeling there's someone who might have an idea on how to disable it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I really don't, I have no idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I would assume that Raishan has some idea on how to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You think? I feel like Raishan would only know how to open up a portal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I have a lot of feelings about Raishan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cassandra speaks up and says, "Well, you've been abroad. You've been gaining arms and allies, "from what you've told me from across Exandria. Let us consolidate our options, our strengths, and "plop it down in front of the Conclave, best we can."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm no master strategist, but we do have allies that we can call upon, and weapons, and men and arms and troops. However, taking the fight to Thordak in Emon seems foolhardy at best. I suppose this is where the intelligence could come into play. Is there some other place where we could go and try to take back from Thordak, to lure him away from Emon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asum steps into the conversation and goes, "The thing with that plan is Thordak has amassed "thousands of lizardfolk in Emon at this point that follow his whim. In the nearby mountain ranges, "many from the Stormcrest, that worshipped him the entire time that he was gone. Wyvern riders "originally aided in taking the city that you met, as did I. But since, other allies have found their "way to the Cinder King's sway. Last that I checked, it seemed that there were a number of "allies that he brought over from his time in the Fire Plane as well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fire giants, in the service of the dragon, now walk the streets."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, if we go into Emon, we're facing fire giants, lizard people, and that's before we get to Thordak the Cinder King?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How the fuck are we going to fight him?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's what we're discussing today."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does Thordak covet any other territory, or city, or town? Vasselheim? Here? Anywhere that we can lure him to?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything he has nostalgic feelings about? Glintshore--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anything that would piss him off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You were lucky to draw a creature of such infinitesimal experience and intelligence as a "white dragon away from its home roost. I would be greatly surprised if you had pulled a great, "powerful, intelligent, ancient red dragon from its home turf advantage."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So your prediction is that we have to slog our way through the outskirts of Emon to fight him on his home turf. Is that about the size of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's one way."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's another?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Distract his allies and go straight for the heart. You have allies, like Allura just said, all "throughout the world."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is true. We have the Herd, we can go get the werewolves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Ravenites would help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone who we ask, everyone who we send in there, we're sending in to their death.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is war.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but it's either death now or death a little later.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're sending ourselves as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, are we talking about sending everyone we know and everything we have to the outskirts of town--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For a full frontal attack. While we bamf into the dragon's lair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. We create a massive fucking clusterfuck on the edge of his periphery and we go for the center.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long did it take you, Allura, to create that heart?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. The design and the development and enchantment of it are powerful enough to anchor "itself to the soul of a dragon of Thordak's strength. Better part of six months."

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Six months.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've probably got a week or two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And that was with a dozen other hands helping me. Most of the Arcana Pansophical was at "my side for that and we don't have that kind of time."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we take a day or two and we amass every heavy fucking hitter we have, and we do this. What other choice do we have?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I keep thinking back to Emon where we watched half of our friends die in a second.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A lot of us are going to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cassandra sits up a little bit in her seat and goes, "If we are smart about this, we can "minimize the casualties far more now than they would be a week, two weeks, a month, a year from now."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What of Whitestone? We put the city at great risk. How much risk are we willing to take?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy, everywhere is at great risk right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should leave Whitestone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But even getting to Emon, aren't we exposing ourselves to detection and attack?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are if we wait.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to march several armies across the entire continent to get there? It'll take days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we get armies there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not ideal, but it's what we have to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's that town that was established?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Outside of Westruun?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's Westruun, Kymal were the two that you moved--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Westruun is close-ish, right, to Emon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Westruun's a little bit further than Kymal is. Kymal is where you sent a lot of the Westruun refugees.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But they're just townsfolk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we can at least assemble there, from all the different territories, and then meet up, form a plan, and then march from there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: March on Emon? If we gather our forces, Thordak will notice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we've got to do a lot of recon before then. But I think he's got a good point, right? We've got to have like a staging point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "However, where the Cloudtop District once stood, there is now but a heated cauldron of glowing "stone and flame. Hundreds of gifts and statues left in Thordak's image litter the outer area, "while a massive cavern dives beneath the central region of the district. Now this cavern, as we've "watched it, we believe it to be the location of Thordak's treasure vault. As well as the "occasional sleeping place of the massive drake we speak of. Thordak is also showing rather intense "signs of physical change since being released from his prison. And his size still remains enormous by "comparison. His eyes now burn with a searing white light. Burning stars in the sky. His jaw ever "dribbles with burning liquid that blackens the ground it touches. The gaps between scales appear "to flare bright with each breath, like a star engine beneath the scales."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sneezes) Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bless you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think it's overtaking him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've no idea. Allura?" And Allura goes, "Well, if the anchor was indeed removed from the "Fire Elemental Plane, then Thordak would have had his soul torn from his body. That is how the "anchor worked."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you don't think he actually even fully separated from the plane, he brought the plane with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Or at least, maybe a piece. I wasn't there, I don't know the ritual that brought him over."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe then we're looking at this the wrong way. Maybe we go at this through the Fire Plane. Maybe there's something still there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A way to sever his connection to the Fire Plane, maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura thinks for a second.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've got an easy door in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I could try. But the enchantment itself-- We don't have enough information. It wasn't bound "to a specific place in the plane, it was bound to the plane itself. I don't know how you'd sever it "from the other side."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: From the other side, we'd have to go there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's called thinking outside the circle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But then once we're there, what do we do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They might--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Another ally.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there like nothing friendly in the Fire Plane?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's at least as big as Tal'Dorei. I mean, it's another dimension.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's huge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's huge, but not many people know the whereabouts. There's still locations and destinations within the Fire Plane. It's navigable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe all the evil things in the Fire Plane are gone right now and they're with Thordak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asum steps forward to the table, and puts his little halfling hands on the edge and goes, "Well, it's a shame that we don't have any information about this ritual that freed him from "the plane."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is a shame. A real shame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll see if my compatriots can gather information, but in the meantime we'll do the best "we can to gather similar information."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we know we don't have a lot of time, but do we maybe want to table this and think on it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At the very least, should we send out some letters, alerting our allies that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit's going down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's time to start stocking up and getting ready to move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Drake steps forward and goes, "I think that's a fine plan of action. Reach out to all "those you brought in. Hopefully we can get a few of our friends in this as well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did an airship ever arrive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An airship? Did anyone see an airship flying around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There hasn't been an airship here, no. Are we "expecting one?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good to know."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The city is invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, so they won't see us if they come. If we see an airship, do you wish us to flag it down?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You trust it?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They are a rarity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe come up with a landing point as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, soon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have one other possible option in front of us. Show them the medal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not going to show them the medal? Not that, no! No, not that. Please don't whip that out, no one wants to see that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, not the cube.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have another ally that we have spoken of.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a tenuous ally at best. Maybe we shouldn't discuss it until we're 100% sure about it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's a big maybe. That's a big maybe. Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, they're very busy though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's really far away and, then as we were leaving, the people that we talked to about it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's fine, I get it! Reach out to your people on one end."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I stab Seeker Asum three times in the back with my sword.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's fucking do this shit! Let's do it! Let's do it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we need to know the ritual!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's too late, he did it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (yelling) Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh Percy, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a surprise attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god, why? We're in crazy costumes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Check out the brain on Brad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got Allura and Gilmore, and Drake.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a lot of people in the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're in a room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whitestone's about to be destroyed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Raishan's about to leave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh man, he's not making you roll stealth, motherfucker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why would he? He doesn't--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because I would. And Hotis did on me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's different.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No it's not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you pull the blade out of the hilt to go ahead and begin to strike-- You're a quick individual. You're also in the presence of an entity that does not trust anyone or anything. You take the blade and swing out in the direction of Seeker Asum. And where your blade strikes, it shimmers through the image. There's a flash, and Asum is suddenly four feet away from the position where Asum was standing. At which point, everyone in the room stands up immediately and is like, "Whoa whoa!" Cassandra goes over and puts her hand towards you, and Asum is taking a few steps back and is like (breathes heavily).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No tricks in here. No tricks in here, if we're really going to do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's this moment of extreme quiet, tension, as Allura's looking at you, looking at Asum, looking around. And there's like this slow, connecting moment of realization throughout the room as everyone's eyes go wide.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we're really going to do this, no tricks in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (screaming)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Amazing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Taliesin!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't trust a man who just kissed somebody! That's a man who's saying fuck it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Backpedal, backpedal, backpedal!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm into it. I'm really into it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, we know, darling. We know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When we last left off, Clarota, over here-- Let us all marvel at that! (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was me all along!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. Are you going to leave that on the whole time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh hell no! I can't see or hear a thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was so short-lived.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three seconds of costume, that's all you get! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can't put just this part on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's really uncomfortable!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just the helmet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do the frigging helmet. I had my arm behind my back for two hours!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why would you do that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Commitment!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have so many guns in my belt! No one can even see them, and I'm still committed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I painted my entire body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is wrong with you people?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good. You're good now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't really claim sanity. I just did something mind-bendingly stupid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a very Merlin from Excalibur thing going on there right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, like lightning! Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We need more green lights in here to really get the effect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Go see Excalibur. Not right now, but tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! So, bringing it back in. As your blade swings through and passes through the form of Seeker Asum, it shimmers and then darts backward into the corner of the room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I immediately sheath and say: No more tricks. If we're going to do this, we need everybody to know what's on the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, everyone who stood up and held off at the chaos, you see all the faces going off in realization. Asum goes from a defensive position and then stands up again. Crosses the arms.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was hoping you were going to take care of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're working on that plan as we speak. But pardon me if I take a few-- how do you say-- "

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know damn well that we're not allies. You know damn well that this is a tenuous relationship. And you know that neither of us trust the other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, Allura puts her hand out and goes, "I'm sorry. What the hell is going on here?!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll get there. I would hope that you wouldn't trust us, and I would hope that you understand that we don't trust you. But we need to make a real plan now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Would you like me to cleanse the room?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm hoping for a conversation to start that I promised I wouldn't start myself. I am trying to keep to the letter of my word.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It might help if Gilmore were to make sure everyone is on the up-and-up in this room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seeker Asum, do you have an opinion on how you would like to proceed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Casually looks up to you and goes to pat you on the shoulder. His illusory hand passing through your form. Goes, "I'm quite comfortable where I am "right now. Let us continue this conversation."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The floor is yours if you wish to tell everyone what the real plan is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've made an agreement with your Vox Machina for "quite some time. Together, using our combined strengths, we slew Vorugal, the Frigid Doom, over "in Wildemount. We've returned to reconvene. I've provided nothing but honest, upfront, and "necessarily vital information to your victory."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will confirm everything but "for quite some time" to the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've just been staring at Allura.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura, you see her fingers are twitching and her arms tense, and there's this very faint air that's blowing her hair ever so slightly, where there's no wind in the air. She's on edge right now and is looking to you guys for guidance, like "Are we doing this?" Cassandra stood up immediately. For the first time in a long time, since Whitestone was reclaimed, Cassandra now resembles more her age than she ever did. She has a look on her face like she's far out of her depth. Understanding the circumstance, there's legitimate fear in her face, and she's looking at Percival with that look of, "What have you done?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's every possibility that we're walking into a trap. Or there's every possibility that we have an insatiably powerful ally. It is a terrible risk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or an insatiably powerful enemy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also a terrible risk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Either way, we can now ask about the ritual.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why don't you inform the room on how you utilized an entire race of people to break the ritual?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "In using their deep, rich-blooded past and forging and making, they were able to convert the soul "anchor into something that housed the essence of the Fire Plane. However, we didn't have a means of "creating a hole large enough to bring both through without destroying both in the process. And as "such, we waited for the right time: The Winter's Crest."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is what is drawing the very land around Emon to fiery eruption. It is also what keeps his soul "on this plane."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What keeps his soul on

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It keeps the soul intact with his body."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Destroy the stone...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It can't be destroyed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "In theory. But we've tried. Believe me; we've tried."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you kept the soul and the stone inside of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To remove it would destroy him as well, as the Arcana Pansophical saw fit. So yes, both came "through. Waited for the Winter's Crest, had enough power and understanding of the ritual to open the "entirety of the tear, and Thordak screamed through, flames in his wake. And

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The fact that you can't shows all the kind of person that you are. My promise still stands. I'm thinking it might come sooner rather than later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You do understand that without my aid, you will not succeed?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I understand that without your aid, none of this would have fucking happened in the first place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, and there are quite a few in this room that fall in that category." She looks to Allura and Drake.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it seems all of us can accept our part in this matter, except for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't think I feel duped by this? You don't "think I have many things I wish to tear from the very corpse of that entity? You think I don't want "to see him burn as much as you do? This vengeance that burns within me!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What would you do if you actually got what you want?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What all of us want: freedom."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull out the Spire of Conflux. There are always many solutions to many problems. You think Thordak is the only solution to yours? This staff was birthed from the head of Melora, the same goddess who gave you that curse. What if you wanted me instead? Me and this staff. Maybe I can help you more than Thordak can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you saying you understand the way to remove this? That you know the secret to burning "this wretched disease from my form?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was your first

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think if I might translate. What my friend here is trying to relate is that, perhaps when the dust has settled, your salvation may either be found in the withering corpse or cackling smile of a creature that you are subservient to, who will take great delight in your destruction. Or perhaps in those you've aided who will feel grateful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's up to you, Raishan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I will advise her to take no revenge until all cards are on the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. Good."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Clearly you are the type of person who looks for answers in other people. You are clearly unaware of accepting any fault or any result of your actions. Why don't you start fresh? Do you really want Thordak to have another sway over you? Another gift, another favor, that he's given you? That he is going to hold over you for all of eternity? Do you really want that? You're stronger than that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's why we're working to watch him fall."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "If you need not my help, just let me know."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me say that right now. This all depends on what you want out of the end of the deal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wish to be given unfettered, unbothered, unwatched control over the corpse upon his death "to extract the information I need. I will leave your very sphere of existence and understanding "until the end of your days."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What happens if we say no to that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, then I'll find another way."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Spoiler alert: we're saying no to that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unfettered I'm fine with. It's unwatched--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then watch! Watch, for all I care. It will be Greek to you anyway."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's taken way too much. She doesn't get to leave!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's already left.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I walk over around the table towards Asum. I try and poke her in the shoulder. Him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It passes through the form.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the deal that's on the table. We are in a tenuous position of power.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can stop poking, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's not here!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's crazy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Give her one more good poke.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do we get in contact with you when we know when we move and how?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, what is your next step through your journey?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was hoping that it was time for everything to be on the table. But this is actually what we're dealing with. This is the complexity. This is the battlefield.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we have to rally our forces to us, and we have to do some really smart recon. Do we make her a part of that or no?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, the more distance that we keep, the better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. She will probably be, I imagine, in our way on occasion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But no one make any mistake. She's lying to our faces. She is not telling us what she wants or what she wants to do. You have a whole plan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Assume what you will."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shut the fuck up! You've been droning on for an hour! Shut the fuck up. You're not telling us what you want. You fucking shit bag. Fuck you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keep great company."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does anyone really believe that this is all going to be fixed if we work with her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we can commune with Melora together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You do not comprehend the magics that you even speak of. It's cute. Look, I agree. Distance "is of aid to us at the moment. If anything, I should probably cut off the information of "Vorugal's fall. I should speak with the Cinder King and still establish my allegiance from his "perspective."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you cut off that information? I would imagine that would be far too much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Cut it off, no. But I can attempt to guide the fury, if you will."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will he know it was us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can guarantee it."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you keep him from attacking Whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For a time, maybe."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you guide his fury in a way that would be beneficial to the plan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If I knew what the plan was, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were saying ideally, if we could get him away?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think we're going to get him away--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to do recon. We're going to send out word to gather our forces-- where?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if he knew where we were?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's find out, let's pick a place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if you knew where we were? What if we found a place? We pick our battleground. He discovers where we're hiding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Raishan rats us out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And Raishan discovers this information.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would certainly put you in the good graces of the Cinder King.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Raishan takes a moment and thinks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are searching for us right now, are you not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am indeed, but Thordak has been using us as the attack."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, he's not going to leave his nest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So what if we kill you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you mean?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How does Thordak know you're alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because I check in every now and then to remind him."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if he sends you out, and we kill you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you never come back? He'd be forced to be the one to have to leave the battlefield.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If he knew where you were headed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're a clever girl. I'm sure you can make a ruse to make you look convincingly dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You wouldn't even have to tell us where you were hiding. You could just hide. And we could ready ourselves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll take mine. There may be something to this plot."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we can all assume that when we exit this room, that our tenuous alliance is still that. Correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would hope that there's no more errant blade pokery?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now that I know your tricks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We do it to everyone. Don't worry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We actually do, now that I think about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's kind of true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're also not alone here. Allura, how does this sit with you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura is sitting right now, she's listening to everything with her hands crossed. Shakes her head and goes, "To be perfectly honest, this bothers me a great deal. But the fact that "Whitestone still stands does speak volumes at the least."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "With the cards being in our favor."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not the first devil I've made a deal with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't always turn out well, Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doesn't always turn out terribly, either.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Asum lives, then?" "Indeed he does. Indeed he does." And Allura turns her head back and goes--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do an insight check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does she know if Asum is up to something no good? 25, I think? Better double check that. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Information flows at this consistent rate of being generally difficult to read. The beat of hesitation is meant for emphasis, more than covering, if that makes any sense. So it seems to have an honesty to it, if you could read any honesty from Raishan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Raishan, now that we know you're you, do you have to continue the ruse of being Asum, or can you bring him here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can certainly bring him here if you'd like. However, he is doing quite a lot of good "with the Clasp, and Brom and Tofor underneath Emon right now, and they've managed to "save many lives and continue to do so."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you could pop him over then? Just for a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're quite powerful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you have need for Asum?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to hear what's going on with the Clasp. I want to see for myself that he's alive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're actually going to have to have a conversation with the Clasp, because we're going to purge the city once the dragon is gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why don't you go see him yourself?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I like her idea. I want to see him here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I feel a little better here. It would go a long way to earning some trust.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, make your choice. Either I intercept and begin to work towards Thordak's ruse and set "a space that convinces him perhaps I've fallen into your hands, or I go retrieve your friend from "Emon. I'm not your errand boy, and we have a limited time here. Which is more important?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure you are. You are our errand boy. We are your vessel to what it is you want. So get busy, and do it quickly. After all, you're very powerful. But that changes day by day, doesn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, Emon it is. Very well. Back in a day."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At least to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's going to be very difficult to pry the Cinder King from his nest."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your supposed death will go far for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If anything, but I have no guarantees."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as everything is on the up and up, and as long as we do not catch you in deep deceit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) Good luck with that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will make sure that the plan moves in the direction it is meant to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "One day then."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the image (disappearing noise).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's going to send Asum to us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So Allura, so it's clear: Seeker Asum is Raishan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And has been since Raishan's appearance in Whitestone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we didn't know until 48 hours ago? Tops?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now, can we maybe make sure that everybody in the room is who they say they are?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go stab everyone, Percy. One at a time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you say that, everyone pulls back from the table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a dragon too! (evil laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hi. Larkin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There he is!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I apologize. I didn't know what else to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You thought you were going to stab him!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes you did, Percival.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was not a play!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's be real about it. "No tricks in this room!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you shifted gears very quickly there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No tricks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've told no lies in this room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (fake cough) Whiff!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I tell that creature no lies. Ever. That is a green dragon. There is no tricking it, there is no deceiving it. There is just telling as much truth as you can get away with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're talking, you feel a tug on your right arm. And you look over and you see Cassandra, who has come over to your side and is pulling on your sleeve with a very intense look in her eye. She goes, "Percival. I can watch Whitestone. I can get the people fed. I can keep "the people armed. I can organize the day to day. I can't keep it safe from that."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which is why I would ask everyone to please not antagonize it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Percival. Percival! I don't know what you dragged us into in this, but I need you to pull us "out of it. I can't do this."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've moved the battle. That is the best that I know how.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How long have you known?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not long, Cassandra.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were forced.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The day before we left to kill the white dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a time difference.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And if we had told any of you, your life would have been in danger.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This was the best way I knew to keep her from destroying this city outright. This was the best way that kept her from telling the red dragon where we are. And the longer that we can keep her a tenuous ally, the longer Whitestone will stand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When she does come back with Asum, this plan that we started in on-- it's a good one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thordak sends Raishan to get us. We "kill" Raishan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then Thordak comes to check on our dead bodies?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We send word of a dead dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How can that plan fail?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I'm not the only one who thinks she's more dangerous than he is at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yes. I think if we give her access to Thordak's body afterwards, we're asking for a lot of trouble.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which is why if Keyleth can figure out a way to cure her of this disease, it takes a big card off the table.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got 24 hours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have ideas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have more than that, because it's going to take quite a while. That's how long we have to make a plan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Question. What if we do actually just kill her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Raishan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When we fake that we're killing her, what if we kill her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just actually kill her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's going to be expecting that, and it will not work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And she's super slippery. She just totally like evaded Percy's sneak stabby-stab.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anyone around right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, no. Allura, Drake--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20, natural 20! For perception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For perception?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I said, "Is anyone around?" and I rolled a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are still in the war room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know what I'm talking about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There it is, it's right there. Invisible fucking Larkin dwarf dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see anybody else around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. That's a 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we continue this conversation downstairs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First, is everybody who they say they are? Please, if you would be so kind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, Allura. Can we light your sage real quick, make sure everybody's on the up and up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura sits up and says, "Well, I mean, it makes sense. Asum is the one that requested we not "move the war room down to the--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So why don't we move the war room now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think that would be the best, yes. Let us all adjourn to the new space at the ziggurat. That "should at least keep things honest."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura picks her robes up and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, your beard might go away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) No!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It just won't grow while he's down there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean for science, right? Let's go. You look really good without a beard, Grog. I've always thought so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can go down there, I don't care.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, you're all led down through the tunnels, which have been a little more refined and given an actual more comfortable path past the now-defunct whitestone refinery that the Briarwoods had originally established. You enter the ziggurat room. It has more lighting to it than it previously did. A number of torches now line the walls, the sconces that are lit as the guards progress upward. You can see the reflection to the green glass-like Whitestone material that permeates the outside of the ziggurat. And not right by it, but partially upward there's a small wooden platform that's been where the main base of operations for research and study is here. You see a number of desks set out. It's been built alongside of the large pyramid-type structure. And eventually, you all adjourn up into that space. As you go up there, you all feel a significant drop in enchantment. All of your magical items, all of everything, gradually fades in this space. So, Grog, you actually feel your musculature-- the Titanstone Gauntlets themselves, the effect begins to completely fade back to your classic, Grog-like strength.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel totally fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are the walls still like people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, do you want to go to the top of the ziggurat and check?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not yet. After the meeting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did they have like a clean-up crew down there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a guy on a scaffold with a scrub brush going, "Ew. Ew."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're really clean naked bodies now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Brush cleaning out the fingernails.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone who's journeyed with you towards this new meeting place, the ziggurat, is of the same physicality they were at the meeting room. Any illusions that would have been cast aside or dispelled at this point seem to not be present. So everyone is, by all intents and purposes, who they say they are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And this also means it would probably be impossible to scry in this room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura nods. "Yes, actually. Yes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent. This is where all talk must happen now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where it should have been happening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So now you know what we've been dealing with for the past 72 hours. She did help with the death of that dragon. In fact, I doubt we would have survived without her aid. She could have very easily left us there to die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's true. She actually revealed her entire form during the battle. Which is quite diseased.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At least it appeared diseased.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's definitely not as strong as the others, but far more clever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And she knows where we are. And what our plans are. And every inch of this place. Including this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well then, what do you presume we do?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't really have a choice, we have to work with her to some extent. We can make it hard for her, and we can be assholes to her, and go tell her to get Asum for us. But other than that, we have to work with her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the benefit of working with her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because if we don't, she can destroy Whitestone whenever she feels like it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if we tell her we're going to fake her death, and then we kill her for real?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fine, if she ever gets close enough for us to kill her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's not going to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She evaded it really easy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would she need to come face to face with us in that plan, ever? She could say, "I'm going "to go meet them in Kymal. Oh, I died!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Our best bet is maybe-- hopefully enough of us still have our strength. Maybe at the end if she has been ravaged by the red dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we try to defeat her after that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it. Not a moment before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we have to beat her to it. If she gets a hold of that stone--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's what she wants.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Our hope is to break the stone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can't break the stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Only because no one has.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we draw Thordak to us, at least we control the battlefield. She could still be lying in wait to pounce on his body the second we kill him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If. We have to hope that she's actually going to fight with us. She's done it once. We don't know that she's going to do it again. We don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Correct? They moved it inside of Thordak, and then Thordak left with the stone in him, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, which I don't think should have been possible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right. So how did they do it? Because I'm also looking at another thing that is supposedly immovable.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Supposedly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's possible. Nothing is impossible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you suggesting we put the vortex of doom inside one of us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kind of, yeah. That's what I was--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura immediately puts her hands up and goes, "No! No. No. No."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's got to be a way to move it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To do what, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is an absence of magic. It is a void of magic. It is a maw that devours magic. The "enchantment that we put within Thordak is pure magic."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you've been working on it for months, and you are smarter than us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. No way to transport it? None at all?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It could be the only thing that could break the stone!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Think about it. If we could get that stone next to the vortex, he'd be fucked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right! So what, we take a few wooden two by fours and push it along? Look, everything I know, "everything I've studied, everything I've spent my entire life working for is useless near that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a temple to Ioun, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The goddess of knowledge?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The only person I know of who rightfully worshipped Ioun was Brom."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Brom?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of the Clasp?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Arbiter Brom. He was of the council with us."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he's in Emon, potentially?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "According to Raishan. With Tofor and--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Brom's with Asum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What holds it there? It's a shame we can't open a giant door and push it down here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did you just say?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can't do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Say it again, one more time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a shame we can't open a giant door and push the dragon in here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How on earth could we--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No one can get in or out without someone walking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You couldn't have used the gate scroll in here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying to even conceive of a machine that could move this. But I don't understand why it's here in the first place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think the secret to defeating Thordak is moving this thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a shame we couldn't. We have a line in the sand of how close we can get to this thing with magic, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This way." And she leads you back down the ziggurat, out to the entrance where you guys entered this large chamber. And about 20 or so meters back, you can see there is a specific wooden support beam that is structured within this tunnel. And on that beam, elements of it are painted black. And she goes, "This is the perimeter in which the siphon devours magic "inward."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How big is it? How big is it, roughly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What, the--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Perimeter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd say it'd take a half-mile?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn, this place is really big. And it's encased in stone, yeah? Kind of, right? Were we encased in whitestone? Right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In stone. I've got a terrible idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tell me!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What happens to magical creatures when they enter the circle? Have we experimented at all to find out what would happen to a magical creature? A creature whose very essence is magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) There's no humane way to do this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure there is! Kiki, get a fey creature in here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I was thinking, send him in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, they die and they go right back to their plane.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I think they just die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And even if they do go back to their plane, they may not be able to in there, they may wither and actually die. I just wanted to put that on the table.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you trying to make me feel better about any of this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been practicing intense levels of honesty, if not telling the whole truth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sidebar. Do we have all the Vestiges that the sphinx told us about?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What else is there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's one in the Fire Plane.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Something for Pickle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Dawn Martyr. Dawn Martyr?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know I'm not the smartest one in the group, but we don't know what the fuck we're talking about with this little sphere. Why don't we go find that last Vestige and see what it turns up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if we have a lot of time--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have time. In a day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, only if we--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In a day she returns. We chose a place, we move our forces in there. We have days where she could be looking for us, and then when she disappears it's going to take a day or two for him to really find out. It will be about three to four days before anything actually happens.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we doing, going after this Vestige when-- can any of us even use it?

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I can. Kima might. I'm not much for poetry, but it seems sort of poetic that Thordak came from the Fire Plane, and the last Vestige we're looking for is in the Fire Plane.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, we might be able to find some information on the stone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Fire Plane isn't just like Dallas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It actually is quite like Dallas. I think that's a very reasonable comparison.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a horrible place where we could all die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, so was the Feywild, and we didn't--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're risking our hides for something that might benefit one of us, maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's what we've been doing this entire time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's basically all of our choices at this point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could go in with the rest of the Fire Ashari that are there. We can meet up with Cerkonos. Is this whole ziggurat encased in whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ziggurat itself is built from stone, and then the upper exterior of it is covered in this green glass-like substance that is distilled whitestone residuum.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a plan. It will take a little bit of time, but it's vicious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It probably wouldn't work. Well, let's find out what happens to a creature inside here before we--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A regular creature or a Feywild creature?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I actually do have Conjure Woodland Beings.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not a magic creature though, it's a woodland being.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, woodland beings can be like fey creatures.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Something small.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it! Oh my god, do it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just a fairy. Just a teeny little fairy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level's that? That is--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Third level.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, if you like conjure it outside and walk in, is it going to go poof and disappear?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially. We'll find out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A fourth level, you mean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, fourth level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you can create some fey creatures, yeah. What are you summoning?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What makes sense?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's going to squeal?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're on one side of the line. Send it to the other, see what happens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll summon a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Little pixie!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A little-- (stutters) A little pixie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (copying Marisha) Lalittle lilittle li-- A little pixie.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A lillul lillul pixie.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi, little pixie! Go in that room!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This may be, by the way, how we deal with Raishan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you conjure a pixie?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. And I send her in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pixie flies in. Continues to fly in. Nothing happens.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pixie's fine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pixie seems fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pixie's not a magical creature, I guess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't it, though?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Has magic, maybe. Isn't a magical being.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you make the pixie do something? Try and have the pixie do something magical.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I have them. Can't they cast like Confusion or something like that? Or can they cast--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Polymorph.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They can cast Confusion, they can cast Polymorph, they can cast things like that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey! Try and Polymorph me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pixie turns around and nothing happens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nothing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pixie looks confused. "What? Sorry."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all right, you did very well. How do you feel? Do you feel all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, this pixie--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Touch it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is very basic communication. The pixie is--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tinkerbell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Sylvan is the language that it speaks, so it is close enough to Elvish that those who speak Elvish can like interpret elements of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I know Sylvan. I know Sylvan. Hey! How do you feel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A little queasy, that's all."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Queasy? Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's weird."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hmm. Hey, will you do me a favor and don't hold it against me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't you let it leave?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just go do it! Just do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Will you go touch that black orb?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No no no, don't do that!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah yeah yeah, go touch it. She meant what she said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, she's only listening to her, so--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it doesn't matter what Percy says.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it. Fucking do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's see if it goes to the other world.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't know where it goes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's right, I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's Esperanto.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't speak Sylvan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've already done my dumb stuff for the day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stab stab stab.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would've been so badass!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so yeah. You continue to walk as the pixie floats up towards the top of the ziggurat. You get to the top and you notice that no, all the bodies have been removed. It's been cleaned up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just an empty pyramid-y thing now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The pixie approaches and like--

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: (whines worriedly)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! Yeah. You got this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Touches it, and you watch the pixie go-- and is gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hmm. So as we expected, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, hold on. Wait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think she's coming back, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey Allura, how many things did you throw in the orb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see her in the back leaning against the wall like she's seen this a hundred times. "Oh, "many things. Chairs, outfits, pieces of stone, metals. We've put all kinds of things."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any animals?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anything alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, nothing living!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was the biggest thing you put in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your desk chair. Cassandra said it would be all right."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you put a box around it? Just encapsulated it completely?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We tried, and upon moving it, once it contacted it did not move with the box. It just "crushed and absorbed the box itself."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So. I have an interesting request which may end up being too complicated. I'm not sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we build a teleportation sigil directly above it? Outside of its range?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Given the better part of a year, yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you're saying there's a chance?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we build one in the hallway leading to this room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A temporary one, as in like a--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the permanent installation of one that takes "an exorbitant period of time."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as we have some way of knowing what point at which we re-enter this room. Then we at least have a way of having it chase us into its range.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or better still, if we run one way and it runs the other.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you been in contact? Have you attempted to scry, or do a Locate Object spell on anything that you've thrown in? Probably?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, but unfortunately there's been no way of connecting anything that goes through. It just "vanishes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think that's a fucking terrible idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (chanting) Fire Plane.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you talking about? We can't lure a dragon into a teleportation circle big enough to get a dragon through, and then somehow assume that the dragon's going to keep running into the room with no magic? And then what are we also going to assume? That it's going to jump into the crazy Vecna circle and become a ninth level of hell after that? We have no idea! That's a terrible idea! I'm vetoing it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I third that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The cereal shiller has a point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That idea's not grrreat! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've been waiting! Waiting to find a time to say it, haven't you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope! Just drunkenly popped in my head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, Grog. You have a point?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fire Plane.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we are going to do the Fire Plane, if that is going to happen, then we cannot go until preparations start getting made for the place at which we're going to have this confrontation. We need to pick a point, preferably far from here. Is there a ruined city?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, for us to lure Raishan-slash-Thordak to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about Fort Daxio?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fort Daxio's near Emon. And so is Kymal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it's north of Emon. Kymal's east of it. And the Ironsea Ridge. But Kymal's filled "with civilians."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fort Daxio has an army gathering there already, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of it went to Syngorn and we haven't heard since."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fort Daxio at least does have soldiers already.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, Syngorn is gathering their forces as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Have you reached out to Syngorn, let them know this was going to happen? You mentioned that "they were coming to power?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we need to reach out to the resources we have and call them in."

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everyone, is Fort Daxio where this confrontation is going to happen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We haven't been to Fort Daxio.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should probably go check it out. But everyone wants to go to the Fire Plane, get some armor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We go to Fort Daxio to start everything up. While they prepare, we can maybe make a trip to the Fire Plane once things are prepared. They will not need us to organize the armies and gather forces.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's really frustrating. I feel like we have all the pieces here. I just can't figure it out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have all the pieces buried underneath every civilian.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm really obsessed on this ziggurat thing. Have you thrown any whitestone into the ziggurat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, don't do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sure they already have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going to be fine, Keyleth. After we kill Thordak and Raishan becomes super-powerful, Raishan will come here and get the Vecna orb and unleash all sorts of hells on the world, and then we'll know what it was!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, that's basically what's going to happen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a very good plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, we can't really do anything about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which is why it's frustrating, because I feel like we can beat her to the fucking punch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I think Thordak's a fucking meathead and we should take care of Raishan ahead of time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You already know how I feel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think you're mad to think we can do that. I think that you're mad to think we're actually going to see her again before the final confrontation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're not going to see her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think she's going to stay far, far away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. She knows.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I took that shot specifically to see where she was sitting and see where we were sitting with her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You took that shot specifically to stab her three times in the back, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It also worked that we found out she wasn't there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, revisionist history.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you were practicing honesty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's like saying I farted because my stomach hurt, and then I found out it stunk as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was aware it could go horribly wrong, which is why I was prepared to say something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Likely, there's a master plan; we understand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not saying it was the best plan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool. Fort Daxio then? Check it out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does anybody else have anything to say to this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We basically don't have a plan. We're going somewhere until we come up with a plan in the meantime.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we're preparing all of our forces at Fort Daxio.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cassandra says, "If Fort Daxio is to be the place where this is to go down, then that will be "the place we'll send our allies."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus. Let's put all of our eggs in one basket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. But what else are we saving them for? This is it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the omelette. Where do we want our allies? Far away from the red dragon?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't feel like we are stepping into every trap that Raishan has laid?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What else can we do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill Raishan first!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can't heal the disease. We can't control this orb. There's nothing else we can do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't matter! We just need her to believe that I can cure her disease.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's be honest. Raishan wants Thordak dead. That's her endgame as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the only thing we can count on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because right now Raishan could have us all dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you saying you want Raishan to go with you one-on-one so you can do the Melora thing, and then maybe you take her out? And you want a shot at it before we try anything else? Because I'll grant you that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could try. That's what I was trying to bait her into.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's not going to show up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura brings her hand up, "I've done plenty of research on these. I mean no offense to you, "Keyleth, but you convincing an entity that exists on deception through deception to believe you in "that regard? And based on that conversation, she already seems to see through that ruse. I would "not recommend it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Allura, any chance you know the Gate spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, that is far beyond my capabilities."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Rare spell, that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not mad in thinking that trusting this creature is the only option available at this point. I say "trust". Walking in this direction is the only direction available at the moment. Any attempt to counter her at this point leads to our destruction. She has us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no, we got that. So does anybody want to do anything else before we go to Daxio?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The only thing else that we can do before we go to Daxio is to send word to our allies. I think we should grab Kash, send him out a quick list of who we need to contact. Ravenites. Feywild wolves.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Syngorn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Zahra, Kash.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your people, Keyleth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kima. Allura.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wolves are on another plane. Herd is wandering.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: J'mon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's by flute. Wait. What about our brotherhood of-- what do we belong to? Not the Clasp--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slayer's Take.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Slayer's Take! We can get them too, right? We have money, we can hire them! We have a hundred thousand gold!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to hire them... Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could take out a contract against the red dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can hire them to kill a red dragon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. What are we going to do with that money when we're dead? Nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are sending everyone we know into one centralized location. Do we really feel like that's a good idea?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, this is what we've built towards.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're building a trap. Where would you put them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We didn't talk about throwing everyone we loved into the frying pan. That was not the trap.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did you think we were making allegiances for? Just to hang out with them? We need them to fight and die for us!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm down for the cause of the war. Just not when it's a stupid fucking plan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to be there too!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't have a plan! We're just asking everyone to meet in one location.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we're talking about building an army.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then doing what with them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To kill the general.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then doing what? They're just going to be sitting there! They're going to be sitting ducks!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to make tactical decisions about where to place everyone in and around the fort.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've accepted that people are going to die. I've accepted that. I do not condone sending people to their slaughter when we don't have a goddamn plan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, what's your counter proposal? Because I feel like we're making a plan here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think that it's smart to put every potential ally we know in one spot. Can we not divide it up? Can we not find places nearby?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everyone is going to be placed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Once we get there and survey the area, we can come up with a comfortable plan. You can make some caverns for them to hide in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to also create ways of making sure the dragon can't take flight. We're going to make sure that everyone has a purpose and a place. It will not be just a giant swath of people ready to die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just getting them in the right county.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We just need everybody in the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we also know that Raishan knows everything that we're going to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She doesn't know Fort Daxio. She doesn't know any of that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Honestly, she's going to have to know. She's going to have to send them. There's nothing we can do about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She doesn't know about J'mon Sa Ord.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't trust that she doesn't know anything. I'm going to assume that she knows everything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a good assumption.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's fair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She knows everybody that's here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this happening? Are we doing this? I'm so excited. Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! I would so lose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bring it! She's on edge, all right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to play this the way we have to play it. It's dangerous, but we have to assume that she will most likely not betray us until the end.

lines.name: SAM
