lines.text: Right now, somewhere, there's a man on an airship going, "Do you see it yet?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're keeping an eye out at this point, all right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're being good. We have to assume that she has not betrayed where we are yet, which would have been so simple. It would have been so simple just to raze this city to the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look at what we did with Ripley. We walked into every trap she set for us blindly. We got cocky. We got bold. We fell for all of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, we have to fight eventually. We're not trying to be cocky about it; we're trying to set up an army!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Might I point out, Keyleth, that Raishan wanted us to go to Emon and face Thordak, and we are already not following that plan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is the other option. Go there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then we talk about the real enemy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a fort. We prepare the fort. It is what a fort is for.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If the opportunity arrives to take out Raishan, then we do it. Beforehand. If not, immediately after Thordak is dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could all be dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why are we not dead right now? Explain to me why we are not dead right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I honestly don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is why we are not dead right now. It's the only possible explanation that I can conceive of. This fight is inevitable. Once this fight has happened? Oh, we're dead. After this fight, I have no doubt that we are in grave danger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Preparing to tackle, to grapple, and to subdue as best we can. To be difficult to find, to be surrounding. We need all of these things, and we cannot do any of these things unless we bring him to a place where all of our power is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go check out Fort Daxio.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Isn't it interesting that we all feel the need to convince her, no matter what? I'm just pointing that out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I don't know how we're going to get the king out of the castle, but yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to figure out if Fort Daxio is the place to send everyone, all right? We got to fucking check it out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's put one foot in front of the other first, shall we?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go buy some black powder. This is the time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we get there? We don't know of any trees there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Victor) "No!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can scry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ironically, any town where you go to buy black powder, it's always him. It's really interesting. I don't know why.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And he's in 16-bit every time! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we know anyone in Daxio? Can you scry there to find a tree?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can scry there regardless and find a tree, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the rest of the council approve of this ridiculous plan?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, I approve.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This non-plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura says, "Yes. I mean, I don't know anyone in Daxio at the moment. Riskel was the only "one. Or Riskel was the one I knew with a connection there, and his father, Mikael, was in "Syngorn."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you think that they will be agreeable to this plan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They'll have to listen to you." She finishes writing it, rolls it up, "So they'll be at your "disposal. It's not the army; it's the reserves."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Any powers that you can think of, let them know where we are heading. Do not let them know the plan. But let them know that if there are forces to gather, they are gathering in that direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And don't share our carefully crafted plan with anyone. The details are so precise and exact! You must keep them secret.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The more precise details you have in a war plan, the more things that will inevitably go wrong in the first ten seconds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, how about we go to Daxio, and then you guys can catch up? The airship arrives in a couple of days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll do that. And then we're meeting you at Daxio, correct?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. (chants) Dax-i-o. Dax-i-o.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (chants) Dax-i-o. Daxio!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Daxio it is. We'll see you soon."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the morrow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Be pleased.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Beep beep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beep beep. Bidet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bidet. (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, we'll finish the night's session, picking up here for next week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're finishing it now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, yeah. It's 10:30.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was under that blanket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know. You'll find out, I guess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dumbfuck ending.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I tried to stab a dragon. I swear, I tried.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we know you did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I tried to end the game. I thought the game could totally have been ended right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got that gunslinger sneak attack times ten damage against a green dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Man, I did the math on what that could have done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It could have been nasty, had it been a less tricksy dragon, maybe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Had it been a less tricksy dragon, that would have been...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, you've got a little something right--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Victor) There? Here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Victor) I get to enjoy this for a little bit, at least.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just put him on Melrose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Those YouTube videos of social experiments? Just send out Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Victor) Two cheeseburgers. Couple of fry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Filet of fish!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Victor) Filet of fish! (normal voice) Oh, man. All right. We'll be back next week. For whatever the hell your final plan is going to be for this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a great plan. I am behind this plan 100%.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I am so excited.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Loot Crate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, Loot Crate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm excited for the countdown to Thordak that we're now embarking on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe there will be time to run to the Fire Plane really quick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say, sorry for being a pain in the ass. It takes a lot for me to sacrifice all my people when a fourth of us have already been sacrificed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll go to the Fire Plane and get them and we'll pick up an object and we'll fight a dragon. It will be great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The glasses make that weirdly threatening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) It's Sergeant Pepper's Lonely Heart Club Band.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: New at Sundance!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool, guys. Thank you so much. Everyone looks awesome. Happy Halloween, everyone!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Happy Halloween!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hashtag Critical Costumes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Get candy from strangers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, go knock on strangers' doors and get candy from them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do it! It's good for America. Eat candy from strangers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Totally inflated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rest well. We'll see you next week. (as Victor) Is it Thursday yet? [music]
